00070 namespace detail {
00072     struct base_random_generator {
00073         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00074         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00075         virtual ~base_random_generator() { }
00076     };
00077 
00079     template <class T>
00080     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00081         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00082         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00083         random_generator(T& g): gen(g,
00084             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00085                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00086         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00087         gen_t gen;
00088     };
00089 
00090     integer random_by_size(base_random_generator& gen, size_t bits, bool
00091         high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative);
00092     integer random_prime(base_random_generator& gen, size_t size_in_bits,
00093         callback_t callback);
00094 } // namespace detail
00096 
00098 // Template function definitions
00099 
00122 template <class T>
00123 integer random_by_size(T& gen, size_t bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on,
00124     bool can_be_negative)
00125 {
00126     detail::random_generator<T> generator(gen);
00127     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(detail::random_by_size(generator, bits, high_bit_on,
00128         low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
00129 }
00130 
00158 template <class T>
00159 integer random_prime(T& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback) {
00160     detail::random_generator<T> generator(gen);
00161     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(detail::random_prime(generator, size_in_bits,
00162         callback));
00163 }
